div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

h4.a: General Updates on School Closure Due to COVID-19

div.p: Check out the most recent HMS update at http://hesstonusd460ks.apptegy.us/o/hms/page/middle-school-updates
Our tennis court resurface project is coming along nicely!

Reminder there will be no lunch or breakfast served today (4.13.2020) at HMS. We will resume our service tomorrow (4.14.2020) from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm. @HesstonMiddle @HesstonHS @HESSwathers @SwatherAD
